itemDescription: Professor of Microbiology at the University of Exeter

wikipedia_page.main: Neil Andrew Robert Gow (born 30 November 1957)  is a professor of Microbiology and deputy Vice Chancellor at the University of Exeter. Previously he served at the University of Aberdeen for 38 years and retains an honorary Chair there.

response: * Neil A. R. Gow – professor of Mircobiology
